charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F From in or about March 2006, to in or about January 2007, in Peoria County, within the CDIL, Dfts knowingly and willfully conspired and agreed to distribute more than 100 kilograms of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of Title 21 USC Section(s) 846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)
21:846=ND.F: From 3/06 to 1/07 in CDIL Defts did conspire to distribute more than a 100 kilos of marijuana, a schedule I controlled substance in violation of 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(B) (1)
